data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi dậy sớm và bắt đầu dọn dẹp nhà cửa.
data.en_hint: We got up early and set about cleaning our house.
data.content_game_1: We got up early and set about cleaning our house.
data.answer_en_hint: We got up early and set about cleaning our house.

data.trans: Thích nghi, quen dần với (môi trường, hoàn cảnh, ...)
data.trans_hint: Chúng sẽ sớm quen dần thôi - bọn trẻ rất giỏi trong việc thích nghi.
data.en_hint: They'll soon settle in - kids are very good at adjusting.
data.content_game_1: They'll soon settle in - kids are very good at adjusting.
data.answer_en_hint: They'll soon settle in - kids are very good at adjusting.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi quyết định một chậu cảnh nhỏ vào trong phòng để thêm chút sắc xanh cho không gian.
data.en_hint: We decided to put a small pot of plant in our room to add some green to space.
data.content_game_1: We decided to put a small pot of plant in our room to add some green to space.
data.answer_en_hint: We decided to put a small pot of plant in our room to add some green to space.

data.trans_hint: Họ vừa mới xây một tòa nhà ngay bên cạnh công viên thành phố.
data.en_hint: They just put up a new building next to the city park.
data.content_game_1: They just put up a new building next to the city park.
data.answer_en_hint: They just put up a new building next to the city park.

data.trans_hint: Người chủ dẫn chúng tôi đi xem vòng quanh nhà và giới thiệu rất nhiều về tiện nghi của nó.
data.en_hint: The owner showed us around the house and introduced a lot about its amenities.
data.content_game_1: The owner showed us around the house and introduced a lot about its amenities.
data.answer_en_hint: The owner showed us around the house and introduced a lot about its amenities.

data.trans: Làm cho thứ gì gọn gàng, sạch sẽ hơn
data.trans_hint: Sau một ngày lau chùi quét dọn, chúng tôi đã làm chỗ này gọn gàng, sạch sẽ hơn nhiều rồi.
data.en_hint: After a day of tidying up, we have smartened the place up a lot.
data.content_game_1: After a day of tidying up, we have smartened the place up a lot.
data.answer_en_hint: After a day of tidying up, we have smartened the place up a lot.

data.trans_hint: Bố tôi đã tháo 2 cái cửa sổ ngỗ và thay bằng cửa sổ kính.
data.en_hint: My dad took the wooden windows out and replaced them with glass ones.
data.content_game_1: My dad took the wooden windows out and replaced them with glass ones.
data.answer_en_hint: My dad took the wooden windows out and replaced them with glass ones.

data.trans_hint: Căn nhà chúng tôi đang sống hóa ra chính là căn nhà ma ám nổi tiếng nhất vùng này trước đây.
data.en_hint: The house where we are living turned out to be the famous haunted house in this area before.
data.content_game_1: The house where we are living turned out to be the famous haunted house in this area before.
data.answer_en_hint: The house where we are living turned out to be the famous haunted house in this area before.
